title: Without a doubt
creator_credit: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: John Rouse, a kind and fun loving man from Yorkshire loved to dress as Santa and even had his own catch phrase, ‘without a doubt’. His daughter-in-law Lyn Skillern and her family remember and pay tribute to him.
creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
